attributes.action: explain to the population why it is possible for the Chinese to have temperature checking equipment AND the authority to quarantine foreign nationals - without formal procedure - when no such facility is possible (according to Mr Brown and his cronies) to protect the population of this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Perhaps there is more to the continued intransigence of this government than we are being told about.  Perhaps the upcoming pandemic and possible hundreds of thousands of deaths is the national emergency which Gordon Brown is praying for which will allow him to suspend routine democratic activity and cancel the next election?

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognise" "explain" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognisable action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
